department.ch: 跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程
department.en: International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience

remark.ch: 中研院跨領域研究大樓C101

goal.ch: The Neuroscience Frontier course, offered by the TIGP-INS program, is designed to immerse students in the cutting-edge research and evolving theories that define contemporary neuroscience. The course will cover a wide range of topics from the fundamentals of neural development to the frontiers of neurological disease.
goal.en: The Neuroscience Frontier course, offered by the TIGP-INS program, is designed to immerse students in the cutting-edge research and evolving theories that define contemporary neuroscience. The course will cover a wide range of topics from the fundamentals of neural development to the frontiers of neurological disease.

outline.ch: Students will choose the research articles provided by INS faculty. Faculty who provide the papers and chosen by the students will be the coach PIs. Each student should present ~30 min for the chosen paper, and the coach PIs are encouraged to discuss with students before the seminar. All students are required to read the designated papers before class.
outline.en: Students will choose the research articles provided by INS faculty. Faculty who provide the papers and chosen by the students will be the coach PIs. Each student should present ~30 min for the chosen paper, and the coach PIs are encouraged to discuss with students before the seminar. All students are required to read the designated papers before class.

domain.ch: 基礎認知神經科學理論
domain.en: 基礎認知神經科學理論

ch.competencies: 獨立設計與執行研究計畫
溝通、表達與團隊合作能力

en.competencies: Independently design and execute research projects
Proficiency and intergration of research tools in Cognitive Neuroscience

ch: 系所:限跨領域神經科學國際研究生博士學位學程。
en: Department:International Ph.D. Program in Interdisciplinary Neuroscience only.
